name: NWAPW Tint
description: NWAPW Tint is a tint-based, fully immersive time management tool. You can create a set of tasks and assign different tint colors to each one. There's no need to constantly recheck a timer throuth the extension; instead, you can enter the key combo: "Ctrl+Space" to show you the current session information.

browser_action.default_title: Edit the sessions and settings here!

display_text.description: Displays the current task as text
